title: Make header logo button background transparent without affecting other header buttons

requirements.summary: Override the global shimmering gold button background so only the header logo/brand button (.header-brand-btn) renders with a fully transparent background across all interaction states, while preserving header layout/scroll-compress behavior and keeping other header buttons unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: On all pages, the clickable logo/brand area in the header has no colored/gradient background behind it (transparent), including on hover/focus/active states.
The header container background remains unchanged.
The logo/brand remains in the same position and retains the same sizing/scroll-compress behavior as before.
Other header navigation/auth buttons retain their existing (gold shimmer) styling.

file_operations.description: Add a targeted CSS override for the .header-brand-btn in the base layer to neutralize the global button background (set background to transparent, remove shimmer animation/background-size) for default + hover/focus-visible/active states, without changing any other button styles. Ensure specificity/!important is sufficient to override the global button rule that uses !important.
